energy_saving_tips.tip: Turn off projectors, fans, and AC after class.
Enable power-saving mode on lab computers.
Use natural ventilation instead of fans when possible.
Use reading lamps instead of full-room lighting.
Switch off electric stoves and heaters when not needed.
Switch to solar-powered water heaters.
Use motion-sensor LED lights at night.
Schedule events in daylight to minimize artificial lighting.
energy_saving_tips.impact: Reduces power usage by 8-10 kWh per event.

energy_saving_tips.tip: Turn off unused electronic lab equipment.
Keep air conditioners at 24°C instead of 18°C.
Optimize router placement to reduce the need for repeaters.
energy_saving_tips.impact: Saves ~0.8 kWh per router per day.

energy_saving_tips.tip: Use lifts only for higher floors and encourage staircase usage.
Limit shower heater usage to peak hours.
energy_saving_tips.impact: Saves ~4 kWh per day per hostel block.

energy_saving_tips.tip: Optimize fuel usage during power outages.
Switch to solar-powered garden lights.
Use automatic pump scheduling to avoid unnecessary operation.
energy_saving_tips.impact: Saves ~10% on water pump energy usage.

energy_saving_tips.tip: Defrost regularly and keep doors closed tightly.
Encourage slow charging instead of rapid charging to reduce energy spikes.
energy_saving_tips.impact: Enhances battery lifespan and reduces peak demand.

energy_saving_tips.tip: Use daylight sensors to automatically adjust corridor lighting.
Keep lights at 50% brightness when natural light is available.
